title: Camaleonda Style Right Arm Sofa
body:
A mid-century design classic, this Mobelaris style of an icon is made completely from high-quality polyurethane foam and upholstered in fabric. This cult classic features its recognizable curved outline and pleated fabric design, making it the ideal sofaÂ to lay back and relax.
Perfect when paired with Camaleonda Lounge Chair and Camaleonda Ottoman.
